title: Unary Function Arity
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of 'Unary Function Arity' in JavaScript. We will learn how to create a function that accepts only one argument and ignores any additional arguments. This lab will also demonstrate how to call the provided function with just the first argument supplied. By the end of this lab, you will be able to implement this technique in your code to improve its efficiency and readability.

meta.title: Mastering Unary Function Arity in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the concept of 'Unary Function Arity' and learn how to create efficient and readable JavaScript functions.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, unary, function, arity, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
